title: Withings launches ScanWatch Horizon with 30-day battery, 100m water resistance, Apple Health support
content:
Popular health device and smartwatch maker Withings is out with its latest wearable. The comes with a classic stainless steel diver design with smart health, activity, and heart tracking, 30-day battery life, 100m water resistance, Apple Health integration, and more.

more…
